content.en: Broadcast scheduling: Researchers have developed efficient algorithms for various aspects of broadcast scheduling, such as minimizing average response time, maximizing throughput, and minimizing waiting time. These algorithms have been proven to provide good performance and can easily adapt to changes in workload. Additionally, algorithms have been developed to address specific challenges in broadcast scheduling, such as avoiding interference in wireless networks and minimizing power consumption while considering flow time.
content.da: Broadcastplanlægning: Forskere har udviklet effektive algoritmer til forskellige aspekter af broadcastplanlægning, såsom at minimere gennemsnitlig svartid, maksimere throughput og minimere ventetid. Disse algoritmer har vist sig at give god ydeevne og kan let tilpasse sig ændringer i arbejdsbelastning. Derudover er der udviklet algoritmer til at tackle specifikke udfordringer i broadcastplanlægning, såsom at undgå interferens i trådløse netværk og minimere strømforbrug, samtidig med at gennemløbstid tages i betragtning.
